fulltext:
NGHIA TRAN (JOHN)
FRONT END ENGINEER
I am seeking a position within the Information Technology department, possibly with an
international perspective (special interest in Western Europe, North America and Japan).
lam an experienced Website Developer looking to continue my career within agency
side development.
6/
WEB DEVELOPMENT SKILLS
Working knowledge of HTML5 / CSS3.
Building Responsive Website and Mobile Website.
Cross-browser coding experience with understanding of code optimization.
Ability to take PSD designs and build in HTML/CSs to W3C standards.
A working knowledge of Photoshop, Sketch.
Knowledge of SEO or semantic mark-up is desirable.
Knowledge of HTML email best practice desirable.
Experience with Bootstrap, Angular 2+, React, Node.js, PHP.
WORK EXPERIENCE
WTH! | May 2016 - July 2019
Senior Front-End Engineer
Building a frontend web application that integrates seamlessly with
microservices backend.
Creating Progressive Web Apps Using Angular 2+.
Creating Web Applications with Reactive Programming and Redux.
Building a chat, note, contact, social, fle manager apps.
INTERESTMARKETINGINC | April 2015-May 2016
Senior Front-End Developer
Web development using Less/Sass, Gruntjs/Gulp, Bower and Backbone
through Git-flow.
Imade the website faster and full responsive, the member's area uses a
REST+JSON API and OAuth authentication.
Worked with back-end team using PHP and Smarty templating engine.
Organic Search Engine Optimization.
PROSTAGE CO.LTD | March 2014 - March 2015
Senior Front-End Developer
I was in charge of the Front-end/Ul of the company websites, working with
the Creative team to deliver a great User Experience.
Ful website development using HTML5/CSS3, Bootstrap, a custom
MV* /OOP JavaScript.
Imade the website Xx faster and fullyresponsive.
PINETECH MULTIMEDIA JSC | May 2011- March 2014
Front End Developer
I built the company's website as well as the front-end of a wide range of new
websites from zero to launch including hyper-optimised landing pages.
Also trained the Creative Team weekly, provided feedback and ideas for new
ventures and worked closely with the UI/UX and Marketing teams to achieve
maximum results.
KEY SKILLS
HTML5, CSS3, SASS, LESS
Bootstrap
jQuery
Angular 2+
React
Node.js, PHP
Firestore, MongoDB, MySQL, Postgre
GitHub, Bitbucket, SVN
Sublime Text, PHPStorm
Photoshop, Sketch, Ilustrator
Firebase, Azure, AWS
LANGUAGE SKILLS
Vietnamese
English
INTERESTS
Running: to unwind and clear my
mind for the day ahead, I try to run
at least 3 km each weekday.
Listening to music: Music is a large
part of my life, and I listen to
everything from hip-hop to jungle
to classical.
Reading: I lke reading newspapers
and my interest is in learning new
stuff every day. Especially new
technology applied in web
development and other fields. My
favorite is"Smashingmagazine.com"
and"Tympanus.net/codrops"> as
mentioned above. Sometimes it
does link to some very helpful
tutorials.
EDUCATION AND CERTIFICATION
ELECTRONICS & TELECOMMUNICATIONS ENGINEERING | 2011
Ho Chi Minh City University of Transport
WEBDEVELOPERI2011
Nhat Nghe ICT Training Center
MICROSOFT CERTIFIED SOLUTIONS ASSOCIATE (MCSA) | 2011
Nhat Nghe ICT Training Center
CISCOCERTIFIEDNETWORKASSOCIATE(CCNA) | 2010
Vietnamese Professional (VnPro) Training Center
RECENT WORKS
yeah1.com
mnewsvn.com
chuthi.com.vn
ING3
DURZLLE

blendedlearning.edu.au
WEMAK

REFERENCES
Mr. Tran Minh Vu
CEO -TMVSolution
Phone: 090 743 6956.
Email: vu.tran@tmvsolution.com
Relationship: Works.
Mr. Nguyen Quan
Technical Manager - Prostage.
Phone: 093 220 9239.
Email: n_quan@stagegroup.jp
Relationship: Works.
